items.title: How AI IS Unlocking The CFO’s True Purpose
items.summary: After a century stuck inside a paradox, AI is transforming the CFO role from compliance enforcer to strategic partner, unlocking judgment, foresight, and leadership across the organization.

items.title: PayPal introduces AI-powered scam alerts
items.summary: PayPal introduces AI-powered scam alerts to enhance protection for customers making Friends and Family payments on PayPal and Venmo.

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Mastering Google Gemini & AI Tools on Android
items.summary: Artificial intelligence is becoming more prevalent, including on Android phones with Google's Gemini AI tools. A guide has been released to help users master these tools.

items.title: AI-generated legal filings are making a mess of the judicial system
items.summary: AI-generated legal filings are causing issues in the judicial system, with hallucinations potentially influencing judicial rulings.

items.title: Verizon Surges as Trump Tax Breaks, Fiber Gains, and EPS Beat Shock Wall Street
items.summary: Verizon surges on a $2B cash windfall and broadband momentum, beating Wall Street's expectations.

items.title: China’s Security Ministry Warns Foreign Chips, Software May Steal Data Using Secret Backdoors
items.summary: China's Security Ministry warns that foreign chips and software may have secret backdoors to steal data.

items.title: ICE Detention Centers Are Worse Than Bad
items.summary: Detainees in ICE detention centers in Florida report being treated like animals according to a new report from Human Rights Watch.

items.title: WEX Taps AI For Faster FSA Reimbursements
items.summary: WEX has introduced an AI-powered tool to expedite FSA reimbursements for users, reducing manual work and streamlining the process.

items.title: AWS, Meta Unveil Startup Program as Zuckerberg Pushes AI
items.summary: AWS and Meta partner to launch a new startup accelerator program to support early-stage companies in the adoption of open-source AI technology.

items.title: ze-prompter added to PyPI
items.summary: The ze-prompter library has been added to PyPI, making it easier to manage prompt templates with versioning and AI models. This innovation will benefit developers working with AI applications.

items.title: ze-prompter 0.0.1a0
items.summary: Ze-prompter 0.0.1a0 is a library designed for managing prompt templates using versioning and AI models.

items.title: Lithuania-based PR agency Wellstone PR launches Synapse, an AI tool that automatically drafts expert comment email responses to journalist queries (Rob Waugh/Press Gazette)
items.summary: Lithuania-based PR agency Wellstone PR launches Synapse, an AI tool that automatically drafts expert comment email responses to journalist queries

items.title: Will ask Centre to restart Goa-London AI flight: Sawant
items.summary: Chief minister Pramod Sawant plans to ask the Centre to restart the Goa-London AI flight, which had been shifted to Manohar International Airport in Mopa. This move aims to boost the economy by increasing flight connectivity to and from Goa.

items.title: The first traces of GPT-5 have appeared
items.summary: The first traces of GPT-5, the successor to GPT-4, have been discovered in code from OpenAI.

items.title: Supposed Galaxy Buds 3 FE render shows up looking like the Pro
items.summary: Supposed Galaxy Buds 3 FE render resembling the Pro model leaks on social media.

items.title: The AI culture that is Faroe
items.summary: The Faroe Islands tourist board is introducing an AI culture named Faroe for travellers seeking spontaneous and serendipitous experiences by letting go of control and decision-making during their trips.

items.title: Two AI jets in trouble; IndiGo aircraft makes emergency landing
items.summary: Two AI jets experience trouble on Monday, with an Air India flight veering off the runway in Mumbai and an IndiGo aircraft making an emergency landing en route from Goa. All passengers and crew are safe.

items.title: Smarter phones, steeper prices: AI could push flagship costs up 15% in India
items.summary: Smarter phones, steeper prices: AI could push flagship costs up 15% in India due to rising chipset and memory costs, potentially impacting consumers.

items.title: Trump posts AI video of Obama being arrested in Oval Office in front of Trump
items.summary: President Trump reposted a fake video showing former President Barack Obama being arrested in the Oval Office, sparking concerns about authoritarianism and misinformation.

items.title: Detecting High-Stakes Interactions with Activation Probes
items.summary: Researchers at LASR Labs developed a method for detecting high-stakes interactions with activation probes, supervised by Dmitrii Krasheninnikov and guided by Ekdeep Singh Lubana and others.

items.title: Google continues to tease Gemini Deep Think with mathematics win
items.summary: Google showcases gold-medal performance in mathematics competition as a teaser for upcoming Gemini Deep Think mode.

items.title: GitHub - superagent-ai/grok-cli: An open-source AI agent that brings the power of Grok directly into your terminal.
items.summary: An open-source AI agent called grok-cli brings the power of Grok directly into your terminal, allowing for easier accessibility and usability.

items.title: Interest In Epstein Podcasts, Books, Documentaries Soar Amid Renewed Scrutiny Of Trump
items.summary: Interest in Epstein-related content rises due to renewed scrutiny of Trump's relationship with Epstein, following reports of a suggestive birthday card gifted by Trump in 2003.

items.title: More than just a bad date: Navigating harms on LGBTQ+ dating apps
items.summary: Queer and trans people can experience harm on LGBTQ+ dating apps, but there are steps they and the apps themselves can take to address these issues.

items.title: Zoner Studio photo editor review
items.summary: Zoner Studio offers a variety of tools, including some AI assistance, to help users enhance their images.

items.title: As AI agents go mainstream, companies lean into confidential computing for data security
items.summary: Companies are turning to confidential computing for data security as AI agents become more prevalent in IT environments.

items.title: Show HN: Lotas – Cursor for RStudio
items.summary: Hey HN! Jorge and Will from Lotas have built an AI coding assistant into RStudio, used by 2 million data scientists. They aim to fill the gap of coding assistant within the platform.

items.title: ChatGPT, AI chatbots may have a big problem on their hands
items.summary: AI chatbots like ChatGPT are facing a potential problem as they become more advanced, offering a wide range of capabilities from answering questions to providing assistance with tasks like homework. These chatbots have the potential to revolutionize the way people interact with technology and each other.

items.title: Donald Trump Has Request for Judge Ruling in Bryan Kohberger Case
items.summary: President Donald Trump has made a request to District Judge Steven Hippler in the Bryan Kohberger case, where Kohberger pleaded guilty to four counts of murder and one count of burglary.

items.title: AI and other future technologies will be necessary — but not sufficient — for enacting the UN’s Pact for the Future
items.summary: AI and other future technologies are important but not enough for the success of the UN's Pact for the Future, which also requires focus on environmental and social justice, financial resources, and incorporation of new technologies.

items.title: Andy Byron's Astronomer Salary Revealed After Resignation
items.summary: Andy Byron's Astronomer salary revealed after resignation from the private data infrastructure startup with a valuation of $1.3 billion.

items.title: Gabe Newell says AI is a 'significant technology transition' on a par with the emergence of computers or the internet, and will be 'a cheat code for people who want to take advantage of it'
items.summary: Gabe Newell highlights the importance of AI as a significant technology transition and suggests using it to improve various aspects of life.

items.title: ob-metaflow 2.15.21.3
items.summary: Metaflow introduces version 2.15.21.3 with more focus on AI and ML capabilities, reducing the need for extensive engineering work.

items.title: India’s 7 major railway stations to get AI surveillance and facial recognition; these railway stations are…
items.summary: Seven major Indian railway stations are set to receive AI-powered facial recognition surveillance systems to enhance passenger safety and modernize security measures.

items.title: ReShape Lifesciences® to Host Special Meeting of Stockholders on July 24, 2025
items.summary: ReShape Lifesciences to host special meeting for stockholders to approve merger agreement with Vyome Therapeutics and asset purchase agreement with Biorad Medisys.

items.title: Google's Gemini AI Wins a Gold Medal at International Math Olympiad
items.summary: Google's Gemini AI with Deep Thinking wins a gold medal at the International Math Olympiad, marking a significant advancement in problem-solving using AI technology.

items.title: Why Voice of the Customer Breaks Down at the BPO Level
items.summary: When BPOs profit from more calls, preventing issues isn't in their best interest, causing the breakdown of Voice of the Customer. This raises ethical concerns about prioritizing profits over customer satisfaction.

items.title: arize-phoenix 11.9.0
items.summary: Arize-phoenix 11.9.0 has introduced new features for AI observability and evaluation, allowing for better monitoring and performance tracking. This update aims to improve the overall efficiency and effectiveness of AI systems.

items.summary: New CEO of AI startup Astronomer breaks silence on scandal involving previous boss, highlighting company's increased visibility and reputation as a result.

items.title: AWS, Meta Unveil Startup Program as Zuckerberg Pushes AI
items.summary: Two tech rivals, AWS and Meta, launch a joint startup accelerator to boost adoption of open-source AI and support early-stage companies.

items.title: Firefox 141 Adds AI Tab Grouping, Reduces Memory Use on Linux
items.summary: Firefox 141 introduces AI-powered tab grouping, reduced memory usage on Linux, a new unit converter, and expanded PiP support.

items.title: Court Orders New Trial for Historic NYC Cold Case Cracked in 2017
items.summary: Court orders new trial for historic NYC cold case cracked in 2017, where voice is AI-generated, raising concerns about potential inaccuracies and inconsistencies in evidence.

items.summary: 47jobs is a marketplace connecting clients with 'vibecoders', developers who specialize in AI-assisted development using natural language prompts with AI tools.

items.title: Rezolve Ai and $150B+¹ Tether Aligned as U.S. Stablecoin Law Ushers in New Era of Regulated Digital Commerce
items.summary: Rezolve Ai and $150B+ Tether are aligned as U.S. stablecoin law ushers in a new era of regulated digital commerce, with the GENIUS Act expected to unlock trillions in compliant crypto payments. Rezolve's AI platform, integrated with Microsoft and Google, is positioned to power this new wave of regulated digital payments.

items.title: This Device Will Scan And Sort Your Trading Cards For You
items.summary: This AI-powered device scans and sorts trading cards for players of card games like Magic: The Gathering and Pokemon, helping organize collections more efficiently.

items.title: 'Cosby Show' Star Malcolm-Jamal Warner Dead at 54
items.summary: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, known for his role in The Cosby Show, has passed away at 54, with voice generated by AI. The news highlights the advancement of AI technology in creating realistic human-like voices.
